title: Set up a Dividend Reinvestment Plan (DRIP)
description: A client wants to automatically reinvest dividends from a specific stock back into buying more shares of that stock.

tasks.description: Identify the client and the specific stock they want to enroll in DRIP.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the client's account and the holding.

tasks.description: Check if the stock is eligible for the dividend reinvestment program.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the stock offers a DRIP option.

tasks.description: Update the account settings to enable DRIP for the selected holding.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully enrolls the stock in the DRIP program.
